Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Uniform land use review procedure application no. 020049 ZSK, pursuant to §197-c and §197-d of the Charter of the City of New York concerning a special permit under the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Brooklyn, Council District no. 38 a special permit to allow Commercial space in excess of 10,000 square feet.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(2) of the Charter or called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d(b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: ULURP, Special Permit, Commercial Spaces, Brooklyn (020049ZSK)
